welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Manzanares el Real, a charming city known for its breathtaking landscapes and historic castle. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture, sample our delicious cuisine, and explore all the beauty our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal used for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
